onCreateCommand: sudo apt-get install -y software-properties-common && sudo add-apt-repository -y ppa:deadsnakes/ppa && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y texinfo help2man flex libsource-highlight-dev libbabeltrace-dev libmpfr-dev libxxhash-dev python3.12-dbg && pip install gdb-tools && mkdir build && cd build && ../configure --prefix=/usr --disable-nls --enable-tui --disable-install-libbfd --disable-install-libiberty --disable-binutils --disable-gas --disable-gprof --disable-gprofng --disable-ld --disable-sim --with-system-gdbinit=/etc/gdb/gdbinit --with-python=python3.12 && make -j5 && sudo apt-get purge -y gdb gdbserver && sudo make -C gdb install-strip && sudo make -C gdbserver install-strip
